verses.roman:
kaṁsā kaṁsavatī kaṅkā
śūrabhū rāṣṭrapālikā
ugrasena-duhitaro
vasudevānuja-striyaḥ

synonyms: kaṁsā—Kaṁsā; kaṁsavatī—Kaṁsavatī; kaṅkā—Kaṅkā; śūrabhū—Śūrabhū; rāṣṭrapālikā—Rāṣṭrapālikā; ugrasena-duhitaraḥ—the daughters of Ugrasena; vasudeva-anuja—of the younger brothers of Vasudeva; striyaḥ—the wives.
translation: Kaṁsā, Kaṁsavatī, Kaṅkā, Śūrabhū and Rāṣṭrapālikā were the daughters of Ugrasena. They became the wives of Vasudeva's younger brothers.
